'''Midlander Billet Trove''' is a one time use [[Bundle]] that allows the player to select a [[Midlander Billet]] of any weapon type:
{{Card|Midlander Sword Billet|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Midlander Bow Billet|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Midlander Claymore Billet|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Midlander Catalyst Billet|1|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Midlander Polearm Billet|1|show_caption=1}}
